金カッパスーツ（女性用）

kDesc
The whole body suit of the Kappa which shines. \n -- it is too dazzling and nothing is seen! There is no \n * custom-made gesture. [#Legal]

光り輝くカッパの全身スーツ。\n眩しすぎて何も見えない！[#Legal]
